summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ScalpMaster The Onyx Collection - Cushion Paddle Brush Review Date: 2020/07/07 Store: Scalpmaster Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Scalpmaster', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3.4 x 9.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B00L3YCFEG_US', 'UPC': '087768014432 755332233434'} Review Text: Love this brush. Gentle and relaxing to blow dry hair with. I bought another one for on the go. Review Title: Awesome Brush! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tigi Bedhead Hard Head Hairspray (6 Pack) Review Date: 2020/08/06 Store: TIGI Product Description: ['One of the most popular of the Bed Head hair care products, the TIGI BH HARD HEAD HAIR SPRAY is a maximum hold hairspray that keeps your coif in perfect condition, no matter what. This long-lasting hairspray dries immediately and is scented with a berry and citrus fragrance. This product listing contains six bottles of TIGI BH HARD HEAD HAIR SPRAY.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Strengthening, Shine', 'Hair Type': 'Coif', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Brand': 'TIGI', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9.84 x 2.95 x 2.95 inches; 1.1 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SG_B00ECBX7SK_US', 'UPC': '733520626510', 'Manufacturer': 'TIGI'} Review Text: Only hairspray I’ll use. Not sticky and washes out easily.
It’s also a great “styling” or “molding” shaper spray.
Much cheaper on Amazon then in stores! Review Title: Two in one spray... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2 Pack Pink Detangling Brush for Curly Hair, ez Detangler Brush Hair Detangler, Afro Textured 3a to 4c Kinky Wavy for Wet/Dry/Long Thick Curly Hair, ExfoliatingYour Scalp for Beautiful and Shiny Curls Review Date: 2021/02/23 Store: NONE BRANDED Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NONE BRANDED', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '9.5 x 2.2 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '767410166107'} Review Text: Nothing like I expected. Very flimsy and comes apart while attempting to brush your hair. Review Title: Dollar Store much better brands! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tarte Amazonian Clay 12-hour Blush Shimma and Shake Mini Travel Size Review Date: 2021/08/23 Store: Tarte Cosmetics Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'clay', 'Brand': 'Tarte Cosmetics', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Package Dimensions': '3.74 x 2.56 x 0.98 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '846733041152'} Review Text: I was hoping for more of a pigmented copper, reddish brown bronzer type of product.
It’s almost pinkish when applied to the skin.
Doesn’t match the color in the picture on my face. Review Title: Very tiny and light colored Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This shopper demonstrates a consistent preference for high-quality hair care products, often expressing satisfaction with items that enhance hair styling and maintenance. Ratings indicate a strong aversion to products perceived as flimsy or ineffective, highlighting a need for durability and effectiveness. Notably, the buyer favors items that offer multifunctionality, as seen in their enthusiasm for a specific hairspray known for both styling and easy removal.

Product purposes mainly revolve around hair care and styling, with the consumer prioritizing tools that facilitate detangling and provide strong hold without residue. Despite some purchases of less satisfactory products, overall tendencies reveal a focus on reliable, effective solutions.

Price sensitivity appears moderate, with buyers willing to seek out better deals online, yet they don’t compromise on product quality. The shopper also values convenience, as evidenced by the preference for travel-sized cosmetics.

In summary, this consumer appreciates effective and durable hair care tools, often with added benefits, and is inclined towards well-reviewed brands despite some fluctuations in satisfaction. Their core preferences hint at an inclination for quality over quantity, with a balanced outlook on pricing.

target_interaction.title: Colors misrepresented…
target_interaction.text:
Was so excited to receive “Cinnamon” reddish/brown tone eyeshadow and thought this looked perfect.
Colors look nothing like the picture. They are purplish and very light.
Extremely disappointed as I ordered them to match a Christmas Eve sparkly outfit!
Do not purchase…Dollar Store has better quality and colors.
target_interaction.title_meta: CITY COLOR Matte Eye Shadow Palette
